quote: I apologized to her once for spending less time with her, but she blew it off. ""You're in love. That makes you actually kind of boring to people who aren't in love. You know, the sane ones.
quote_letters: I APOLOGIZED TO HER ONCE FOR SPENDING LESS TIME WITH HER BUT SHE BLEW IT OFF YOURE IN LOVE THAT MAKES YOU ACTUALLY KIND OF BORING TO PEOPLE WHO ARENT IN LOVE YOU KNOW THE SANE ONES
